artifactDefinition.businessDescription: This token has a controlling a central party, the issuer, is the only one able to create/transfer/destroy tokens. Other parties can inspect (only their own) holdings, but may not transfer tokens; to do this they need to request the issuer to perform the action using a `RequestTokens` contract.
artifactDefinition.businessExample: A private issued stock which is not listed on any exchange may require the owner's permission to sell shares issued to the seller.

influencedBySymbols.description: Roles is common to implement to provide authorization checks for invoking the behavior. Highly Recommended that Role restrictions be applied to MintTo invocations.

invocations.name: AuthorizeInvestor
invocations.description: A request to create new token instances in the class by the owner or a party or account in a role that is granted this permission. Minted tokens using this invocation will be owned by the owner or token pool account. Requires a Quantity field in the request.

inputParameters.name: Quantity
inputParameters.valueDescription: Number of new tokens to create.

outputParameters.name: Confirmation
outputParameters.valueDescription: A confirmation receipt or error may be returned to the invoker based on the outcome of the mint request.

invocations.name: AcceptToken
invocations.description: A request to create new token instances in the class by the owner or a party or account in a role that is granted this permission to another party or account.  Requires a To and Quantity fields in the request.

inputParameters.name: ToAccount
inputParameters.valueDescription: Account Id to mint the tokens to.

inputParameters.name: Quantity
inputParameters.valueDescription: Number of new tokens to create.

outputParameters.name: Confirmation
outputParameters.valueDescription: A confirmation receipt or error may be returned to the invoker based on the outcome of the MintTo request.

invocations.name: RequestTokens
invocations.description: A request to create new token instances in the class by the owner or a party or account in a role that is granted this permission to another party or account.  Requires a To and Quantity fields in the request.

inputParameters.name: ToAccount
inputParameters.valueDescription: Account Id to mint the tokens to.

inputParameters.name: Quantity
inputParameters.valueDescription: Number of new tokens to create.

outputParameters.name: Confirmation
outputParameters.valueDescription: A confirmation receipt or error may be returned to the invoker based on the outcome of the MintTo request.
